title: Bitcoin’s Price Falls Below $20,000
sub_head: The cryptocurrency has lost 72% of its value from its record high in November
body:
The price of bitcoin lurched below $20,000, and below a level widely monitored by cryptocurrency enthusiasts, as a brutal selloff in crypto showed no signs of abating.
Bitcoin fell as low as $18,739.50 and stayed below $20,000 on Saturday, according to CoinDesk, losing 72% of its value from its high in November. Concerns about the Federal Reserve’s actions to tame higher-than-expected inflation have pushed both stocks and cryptocurrencies into a bear market. Big names in the industry, including Coinbase Global Inc., the biggest cryptocurrency exchange in the U.S., have recently announced job cuts.
